# Profile of Patients

## Total Patients per Type of Ward

```{r fig.width = 6, fig.height = 4}
patient_filter() %>%
  group_by(ward) %>%
  summarise(patients = n()) %>%
  mutate(ward = replace_na(ward, "Unknown Ward")) %>%
           ggplot(aes(x = ward, weight = patients)) + 
           geom_bar() +
           geom_label(aes(y = patients, label = patients)) +
           coord_flip() +
           labs(x = NULL, y = "Total Patients", x = "Ward") +
           theme_minimal()

```
